stripped_text: Whenever you install a program or piece of hardware, place 1 power counter on this resource. When there are 4 or more hosted power counters, trash this resource and gain 9 credits.
text:
Whenever you install a program or piece of hardware, place 1 power counter on this resource.
When there are 4 or more hosted power counters, trash this resource and gain 9[credit].
title: Environmental Testing
